Helmet.name: Raven’s Shadow
Helmet.description: A helmet made from the feathers of a raven. It provides a slight boost to speed (+1).

Helmet.name: Titan’s Helm
Helmet.description: A heavy helmet once worn by the Titans of old. It increases health (+2) and armor (+1).

Helmet.name: Crown of the Demon Lord
Helmet.description: A crown said to have been worn by the demon lord himself. It greatly enhances combat abilities (+5), increases health (+5), and provides a special bonus of increased morale (+5).

Necklace.name: Amulet of the Wind
Necklace.description: A light amulet that slightly increases speed (+1).

Necklace.name: Pendant of Vitality
Necklace.description: A pendant that boosts health (+3), armor (+2), and lifeRegeneration (+2).

Necklace.name: Celestial Locket
Necklace.description: A locket containing a piece of Celestia, providing a major boost to health (+4), armor (+4), mana (+4), and manaRegeneration (+4).

Weapon.name: Iron Sword
Weapon.description: A basic sword that provides a small increase to combat (+1).

Weapon.name: Flamebrand
Weapon.description: A sword imbued with fire, enhancing combat abilities (+2) and speed (+2).

Weapon.name: Demonbane
Weapon.description: A sword said to have slain the demon lord, greatly boosting combat (+5), speed (+5), and provides a special bonus of increased command (+5).

Body Armor.name: Leather Armor
Body Armor.description: Basic armor that provides a slight increase to armor (+1).

Body Armor.name: Chainmail of the Titans
Body Armor.description: Armor crafted in the style of the Titans, boosting health (+3), armor (+3), and resistance (+2).

Body Armor.name: Celestial Robes
Body Armor.description: Robes woven from the fabric of Celestia itself, providing a major boost to health (+5), armor (+5), mana (+4), and manaRegeneration (+4).

Leggings.name: Traveler’s Trousers
Leggings.description: Comfortable trousers that slightly increase speed (+1).

Leggings.name: Greaves of the Titans
Leggings.description: Heavy greaves that increase health (+2) and armor (+1).

Leggings.name: Demon Lord’s Leggings
Leggings.description: Leggings said to have been worn by the demon lord, greatly enhancing combat abilities (+5), health (+5), and provides a special bonus of increased training (+5).

Boots.name: Boots of Swiftness
Boots.description: Light boots that slightly increase speed (+1).

Boots.name: Titan’s Sabatons
Boots.description: Heavy boots that boost health (+3), armor (+2), and speed (+2).

Boots.name: Celestial Sandals
Boots.description: Sandals said to have been worn by the celestial beings, providing a major boost to speed (+5), command (+4), morale (+4), and magery (+4).

Ring.name: Ring of Strength
Ring.description: A simple ring that provides a small increase to combat (+1).

Ring.name: Ring of the Titans
Ring.description: A ring crafted in the style of the Titans, boosting health (+2) and armor (+1).

Ring.name: Celestial Band
Ring.description: A ring said to contain a piece of Celestia, greatly enhancing all stats (+5) and provides a special bonus of increased spellCastingChance (+5).
